Regulation Name(s): Factor V Leiden DNA Mutation Detection Systems
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Third-party thermal cycler (e.g. ABI GeneAmp PCR System 9700, ABI Veriti, MJ Research PTC-100)
Fluorometers (e.g. Tecan Infinite, Tecan Genius, BiTek FLx800)
Standalone PC with Invader Call Reporter™M Software
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Invader® MTHFR 677 test kit for qualitative genotyping of MTHFR 677 SNP using Invader® chemistry and PCR in whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic test intended for detection and genotyping of the C to T mutation at position 677 of the human MTHFR gene in genomic DNA from whole blood potassium EDTA samples from patients with suspected thrombophilia
